# Main

## Daniel Väisänen {#title}

### PhD student in epidemiology

I am a Swedish Ph.D a student with a background in Sociology and Sport Science with a passion for epidemiology, data science and reproducible research. My favorite topics are public health, complex data management and unraveling the mechanisms of complex outcomes.
